page.title: 15ROBIN TANNER-RETIRED H.M.I.
page.content: ROBIN TANNER IS 81 YEARS OF AGE AND LIVES AT CHAPEL FIELD IN THE VILLAGE OF KINGTON LANGLEY WHERE HE HAS LIVED FOR 50 YEARS . THE VILLAGE IS 2KM NORTH OF CHIPPENHAM . MRS HEATHER TANNER'S UNCLE DESIGNED THE HOME THEY LIVE IN . WHEN ROBIN TANNER BECAME A TEACHER AT IVY LANE SCHOOL IN 1935 HE HAD TO WALK OVER 2KM TO HIS SCHOOL IN CHIPPENHAM . HE WENT FROM HIS HOUSE DOWN MORELL LANE THROUGH JACKSOMS LANE THEN ONTO BIRDS MARSH THROUGH THE MEADOWS TO GREENWAY LANE (WHERE IF IT WAS RAINING HE WOULD LEAVE HIS BOOTS UNDER THE HEDGE TO COLLET THEM ON THE WAY HOME). MR TANNER ONLY TAUGHT FOR 5 YEARS AS HIS SKILL WAS RECOGNIZED BY AN H.M.I AND HE WAS INVITED TO JOIN THEM AS AN H.M.I.WITHOUT EVER HOLDING THE POSITION OF DEPUTY OR HEAD TEACHER . MR TANNER WENT NORTH TO LEEDS . (CONTINUED ON NEXT PAGE.)
